title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: Menzel Joseph Do true artists have a particular ability to perceive reality, a sense of unity, beyond the... <!--more--> illusion of separation and division that distorts western culture today?
Menzel Joseph, award winning artist and relative of Adolph Menzel, Germanys most prolific 19th century painter, and a long-time activist will be our guest to speak about the loss of clear observation in society today and how this loss of perception is threatening life on the planet.
